Incision and drainage with bolster dress.context: Incision and drainage with bolster dressing placement of right ear recurrent auricular hematoma.

recurrent auricular hematoma.context: Preoperative Diagnosis: Recurrent severe right auricular hematoma.

Xylocaine 1% with 1:100,000 dilution of.context: Anesthesia: Xylocaine 1% with 1:100,000 dilution of epinephrine totaling 2 mL.

serosanguineous drainage.context: Findings: Approximately 5 mL of serosanguineous drainage.

suture removal.context: She presents for suture removal; however, there is still fluid noted now at the antihelix fold above the concha bullosa below previous sutures placed by Dr. X.

fluid.context: She presents for suture removal; however, there is still fluid noted now at the antihelix fold above the concha bullosa below previous sutures placed by Dr. X.

poor wound care.context: Wound care by the patient appears to be very poor if any at all being performed which may be complicating matters.

auricular deformity.context: The patient is aware that the complications with this ear area severe and auricular deformity is inevitable.

Keith needle bolster dressing.context: A through-and-through Keith needle bolster dressing was applied with cottonoid pledget on both sides of the ear to help compression.
